trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Dayton
There were no other sightings in Dayton on or around December 1st 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAfter working until dark in Dayton Texas my son and I were heading home to Porter Texas on FM 1960.Traveling west we could see airplanes stacked up for miles on the glide path for Bush Intercontinental Airport.I noticed the field to the right of my truck began to glow .I told my son, he looked at the field then he looked up.He said that is the biggest plane he has ever seen,as it passed us I saw it had no strobes on it.It was only about 500 feet above the ground.It had white lights on what appeared to be the wing tips with one red light in the center.Its heading was west north west,in five minutes it was gone.It did not make a sound,the wingspan was as wide as five Boeing 747's side by side.It looked like a huge triangle shaped wing.It appeared to be about a quarter mile from our truck as it passed us.An airplane this close to us would make noise.No sound-no strobes or rotating beacon lights.I don't know what this was,I just know it was not an airplane that the public knows.I did not have a camera with me this is my biggest regret.
